name: Escape the Madness
description:
Go deeper and deeper into your stranges "dreams".

Escape Madness is a point and click.

You need to resolve some enigmes in your stranges dreams to continu and discover your biggest nightmare.

You just need a mouse to play at this game.

Made by :

- CILLUFFO Pierre : Dev parts

- LAURENT Clémentine : Art parts

Escape the Madness 1.0.0 : Original version

Escape the Madness 1.0.1 : Bug fix
